overview: Hip Hop for Kids is a 30 minute program introduces kids to Hip Hop dance. Our host Roger G has been featured with Jay Z and has appeared on 106 & Park and Def Comedy leads our kid dancers through a fun Hip Hop work-out.˙ Learn the latest Hip Hop steps from Melissa, Adia, Shani, Antoine, and Chi-Chi, Stretch, Dance, Work Out!˙ It's all for fun! Age-6-12˙ Parent?s Choice Winner.
title: Hip Hop for Kids
